auth_token = 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJhZG1pbjExNTUiLCJpYXQiOjE3NTM5NzI1NTcsImV4cCI6MTc1Mzk3OTc1N30.vcSylVhV7w25StQ147PqLr1nZV86-loLuVhwBF4pgsI'

    @allure.feature("用户认证模块")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("case", CASES)
    def test_user_auth(
        case,
        auth_token,
        small_jpg_image,
        large_jpg_image,
        small_png_image,
        large_png_image,
        non_image_file
    ):
        allure.story(case["name"])
        allure.title(f"{case['case_id']}: {case['name']}")
    
        # 文件映射：用例文件名 -> 实际测试文件
        file_map = {
            "test_avatar.jpg": small_jpg_image,
            "large_avatar.jpg": large_jpg_image,
            "test_avatar.png": small_png_image,
            "large_avatar.png": large_png_image,
            "test_file.txt": non_image_file
        }
    
        # 预处理请求
        request_data = preprocess_request(case, auth_token, file_map)
    
        # 注册用例单独处理验证码
        if (case["case_id"].startswith("auth_00")
            and case["method"] == "POST"
            and case["url"] == "/auth/register"):
    
            # 获取注册邮箱
            email = request_data["json"]["email"]
            # 发送并获取验证码
            verify_code = send_and_get_verify_code(email)
            # 填充验证码到请求参数
            request_data["json"]["verifyCode"] = verify_code
    
        # 发送请求
        response = Request.send_request(
            method=case["method"],
            endpoint=case["url"],
            json=request_data.get("json"),
            params=request_data.get("params"),
            headers=request_data.get("headers"),
            files=request_data.get("files"),
            token=auth_token if case["case_id"] != "auth_029" else None  # 未登录用例移除token
        )
    
        # 断言
>       assert_response(
            response,
            expected_code=case["expected_code"],
            expected_success=case.get("expected_success"),
            expected_message=case.get("expected_message")
        )
